posts.post_content: Dredge Deck mills itself to put Narcomoebas into play, then sacrifices them to Dread Return to play Iona or Flamekin Zealot while creating a dozen zombie tokens in the process.

posts.post_content: narcomoeba is compatible because if you dredge (ie mill yourself) you have a decent chance of putting both this and narcomoeba into your graveyard from your library, then you get to cast this with absolutely no prior investment, along with some big creature you dredged out. you don't even have to put blue in your deck to do this.

posts.post_content:
The part i like most is that unlike [Snuff Out](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Snuff Out) for example, the effect also works if you don't have any swamps.  
So if you're not going to hard cast this anyways, you can cast it from your graveyard without even splashing black.
